title: Death Valley National Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit        Zabriskie Point at Sunset Ronald R Gaddis      The Death Valley Visitor Guide (3.02 Mb .pdf) is a good source of of information in one location. It includes pages on Desert Survival, What To See, Walks & Hikes, Park Map, Park News, Natural Resources, Planning Your Trip, and Visitor Services.              Basic Information   Operating hours and seasons, weather, fees, and visitor centers.        Eating and Sleeping   Lodging information, campgrounds, and restaurants.        Directions and Transportation   Maps, airport information, and basic directions.              Things to Do   Outdoor and indoor activities, ranger programs, and more!        Places To Go   Information on the points of interest in the park.              Plan a Summer Visit   Tips to plan a safe and enjoyable visit to Death Valley in the summer months.        Safety   Tips for staying cool, hantavirus, mines, and more.        Nearby Attractions   Manzanar National Historic Site, Ash Meadows National Wildlife Refuge, Rhyolite Ghost Town, and more!
